snippet.title: The Legend of Vraz - PC Steam Release
snippet.description:
The Legend of Vraz features fun-filled exciting gameplay of 6-9 hours amidst fantasy worlds created with stunning hand-painted 2D art and inhabited by mesmerizing characters.

It is based on an Indian legend and is the first arcade game based on Indian Miniature painting style and is playable by all age groups. In this story-based adventure game, the prince and the princess meet, fall in love and the Prince braves the world of exotica to win the love for Princess. 

This best Indian game explores the realms of a culture that is hardly touched by usual video games. It propels the players to utilize their reflexes and mind in the best possible manner and is a respite from the violence usually seen in other games.

Game enthusiasts who have played this game love it and believe the game is suitable for children as well since there are no bloodsheds, deaths, violence or use of any abusive language.

The free steam games demo version has 3 levels in different environments, helping gamers acquire a feel of the game.

Game Page: https://zatun.com/games/legend-vraz/

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/926490/The_Legend_Of_Vraz/
